alert.note: Alert for McMinn; Northwest Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 11:22AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McMinn, southwestern Blount and Monroe Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1222 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Etowah, or 8 miles southeast of Athens, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madisonville, Etowah, Englewood, Vonore, Tellico Plains, Fort Loudon State Park, Tariffville, McGee Carson Peninsula, Bullet Creek and Citico Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for southwestern North Carolina...and east Tennessee.
